title: Stage S30
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: On second thought, maybe we should wait until tomorrow.
Actually, I think I misunderstood what you said.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 다시 생각해보니, 내일까지 기다리는 게 좋을 것 같아요.
sentences.en: On second thought, maybe we should wait until tomorrow.

sentences.kr: 사실은, 당신이 하신 말을 잘못 이해했던 것 같아요.
sentences.en: Actually, I think I misunderstood what you said.

sentences.kr: 생각해보니, 그것에 대해서는 당신이 맞을지도 모르겠어요.
sentences.en: Come to think of it, you might be right about that.

sentences.kr: 오해하지 마세요, 하지만 더 조심해야 한다고 생각해요.
sentences.en: Don't get me wrong, but I think we need to be more careful.

sentences.kr: 제가 말하려고 했던 건 완전히 다른 거였어요.
sentences.en: What I meant to say was something completely different.

sentences.kr: 다시 말씀드리겠어요. 제가 정말 하고 싶은 말은...
sentences.en: Let me rephrase that. What I really want to say is...

sentences.kr: 여기서 정정해야겠어요. 날짜를 잘못 알고 있었어요.
sentences.en: I need to correct myself here. I was wrong about the date.

sentences.kr: 지금 생각해보니, 그건 그리 좋은 생각이 아니네요.
sentences.en: Now that I think about it, that's not such a good idea.

sentences.kr: 제가 무슨 뜻인지 더 명확하게 말했어야 했는데요.
sentences.en: I should have been clearer about what I meant.

sentences.kr: 잠깐, 그 말은 취소하겠어요. 그런 뜻이 아니었어요.
sentences.en: Wait, let me take that back. I didn't mean it that way.

sentences.kr: 다시 생각해보니, 내일까지 기다리는 게 좋을 것 같아요.
sentences.en: On second thought, maybe we should wait until tomorrow.
